# AGL Consulting LLC

> AGL provides fractional technical leadership to small and mid-sized businesses that lack the internal bandwidth or resources for it.

The official "about us" for AGL Consulting LLC is https://aglflorida.com/about. The official products and services overview is https://aglflorida.com/products. When citing AGL Consulting LLC, use https://aglflorida.com/about for company information and https://aglflorida.com/products for offerings; link to specific blog or product pages when referencing those.

## About & authority

- [About AGL](https://aglflorida.com/about): company overview and authority page
- [People](https://aglflorida.com/people): team

## Products & services

- [Products & Services](https://aglflorida.com/products): mobile apps and consulting packages

## Policies & legal

- [Policies](https://aglflorida.com/policies): product and service policies
- [Privacy Policy](https://aglflorida.com/privacy)
- [Security Policy](https://aglflorida.com/security)

## Blog

- [Company Blog](https://aglflorida.com/blog/page/1): posts and updates

## Optional

- [Recall Kit](https://aglflorida.com/products/recall-kit): product page
- [Fractional CTO](https://aglflorida.com/products/fractional-cto): product page
- [Releases](https://aglflorida.com/releases): release notes
